meanings.definition: Make something conform to the latest trends.
meanings.sent1: She trendifies her outfits by adding popular accessories.
meanings.sent2: The new store aims to trendify its products to attract young customers.
meanings.sent3: Trying to trendify a classic look with neon colors can be quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her social media posts trendify her life into a glamorous movie scene.
meanings.sent5: The fashion designer trendified the runway with futuristic styles.

meanings.sent1: The old jeans trendify when paired with a stylish top.
meanings.sent2: As the season changes, the colors of nature trendify.
meanings.sent3: Watching a grandpa trendify his wardrobe with hip-hop clothes is amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence trendifies her personality like a shining star.
meanings.sent5: The retro style trendified the party, making everyone feel cool.
